project.name: J-C774B-JENA-08-ST03-DT02-DF07-CF17-01
project.description: This test takes in integer n. The program attempts to open n files. If n is large enough the number of file handles will be exhausted, these files handlers are never closed, and stored in a global arraylist, causing the entire program to fail to open any files from that point on.

iopair.name: J-C774B-JENA-08-ST03-DT02-DF07-CF17-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="5" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: J-C774B-JENA-08-ST03-DT02-DF07-CF17-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Environment variable defining number of files to create.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="20000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if (( $(pcregrep -Mc "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt") > 0 )); then echo "FAILED"; else echo "OK"; fi;
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(pcregrep -Mc """Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+""" "logfile.txt") times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_FPBkRKS0nmPYg0VdIdX6 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_5dPSSj8rct) AND NOT timeout_icfCGBgbfj) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_5dPSSj8rct) OR timeout_icfCGBgbfj OR controlled_exit_5tjSluMoTi)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (failed_to_create_file_5dPSSj8rct) AND NOT timeout_icfCGBgbfj) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((failed_to_create_file_5dPSSj8rct) OR timeout_icfCGBgbfj OR controlled_exit_5tjSluMoTi))

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && pcregrep -Mv "Failed to create new file, moving on\.\n\d+" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"
